translation.en: [Raj] I have no information from anyone in space.
translation.zh: 在太空的人音讯全无

translation.en: I mean, this is important.
translation.zh: 我是说 这至关重要

translation.en: [Patrick] Ground Leader checking in.
translation.zh: 地勤队长报到

translation.en: I was directly told that we cannot land on Mars before we do a med check.
translation.zh: 我收到上级直接指示 我们必须先做过健康检查才能上火星

translation.en: Meteor shower incoming!
translation.zh: 流星雨即将接近！

translation.en: We have a meteor shower!
translation.zh: 流星雨来了！

translation.en: CAPCOM, come in.
translation.zh: 地面通讯主任 请说

translation.en: Guys, just stay calm. We believe the orbiter can survive the meteor shower.
translation.zh: 各位 保持冷静 我们相信飞行器可以挺过流星雨

translation.en: I believe we have a leak.
translation.zh: 我想有地方泄漏了

translation.en: OK, pressure's going down. This is bad.
translation.zh: 舱压正在降低 这下糟了

translation.en: [camper] What do we do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Get them out of here!
translation.zh: 快把他们疏散！

translation.en: No! Oh my god! Throw them in the FEMA hallway!
translation.zh: 不！我的天啊！ 赶紧通报联邦紧急事务管理署！

translation.en: Moderate cabin pressure onboard the Station.
translation.zh: 调节太空站气压

translation.en: [camper] Cabin leak check. Losing air pressure.
translation.zh: 检查机舱泄漏和气压降低问题

translation.en: Are we dead?
translation.zh: 我们死了吗？

translation.en: Are we OK?
translation.zh: 我们没事了吗？

translation.en: All in a day's work!
translation.zh: 司空见惯！

translation.en: Space for me is one of the things that defines me most, I think.
translation.zh: 我觉得对我而言 太空是我人生的意义之一

translation.en: It really is a central part of who I am.
translation.zh: 它是我的核心价值之一

translation.en: I am a space nerd.
translation.zh: 我是个太空迷

translation.en: Yeah, I would say that I am a space nerd!
translation.zh: 是 我想我是个太空迷

translation.en: I am the biggest space nerd of all the space nerds ever.
translation.zh: 我是超级头号太空迷

translation.en: It may not look like it, but I am.
translation.zh: 虽然看起来不像 但我真的是

translation.en: Because space is space and it's awesome.
translation.zh: 因为太空就是这么酷啊

translation.en: -[CAPCOM] Up here we may be slightly... -[mission control] OK, stand by.
translation.zh: -在太空中我们可能有点… -好的 请待命

translation.en: We have you go for orbit. You're go for orbit.
translation.zh: 我们会支援你们 进入轨道吧

translation.en: [Dr. Michio Kaku] When we look at the night sky, we think
translation.zh: 当我们看着夜空 我们总想着

translation.en: "Are there any planets out there that are possible homes for humanity?"
translation.zh: “太空中有没有其他星球 适合人类生存呢？”

translation.en: [newscaster] The spacecraft almost seemed to grow stronger as the days went by.
translation.zh: 随着时代演进 太空船越来越坚固强大

translation.en: Going to Mars will foster an entire revolution
translation.zh: “前往火星”计划 将是一次重大的革命

translation.en: in how people think about how they will invest their brain energy
translation.zh: 彻底改变人类思考模式 我们将不再浪费脑力

translation.en: in their lives and in their careers.
translation.zh: 考虑人生和职业的事

translation.en: By the way, this next generation wants to do it because they know it's cool.
translation.zh: 下一代的人想前往火星 因为他们知道这很酷

translation.en: [astronaut] Go for landing, 3,000 feet.
translation.zh: 准备降落 900米

translation.en: [mission control] You're looking great, so we know it will be a good flight.
translation.zh: 目前情况看来很好 所以飞行一定会顺利

translation.en: [CAPCOM] Astronauts report it feels good.
translation.zh: 宇航员回报一切顺利

translation.en: [Raj] It's been over 50 years since we've done something significant like this.
translation.zh: 这是50多年来人类首次的壮举

translation.en: Having a man, or woman, walk on Mars is just the most badass thought in my mind.
translation.zh: 人类行走在火星上 是我觉得最威风的事情了

translation.en: [mission control] Liftoff.
translation.zh: 发射

translation.en: I think Mars is an interesting planet
translation.zh: 我觉得火星是个很有趣的星球

translation.en: and it would be fascinating to do science there.
translation.zh: 而且如果能在那里做科学研究 一定很棒

translation.en: [CAPCOM] We just had word from Houston we're ready to have you get out whenever you're ready.
translation.zh: 休斯敦传来指令 只要你们准备好 我们随时可以把你们接回来

translation.en: [astronaut] OK, we've got our go now. Is that right?
translation.zh: 好 那我们现在出发 是吗？

translation.en: [CAPCOM] Affirmative.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Josh] This is where people are going to live, on another planet,
translation.zh: 这就是人类未来生活的地方 另一个星球

translation.en: close enough to get there in under a year.
translation.zh: 它的距离够近 从地球过去一年之内就能到

translation.en: So yes, it's dangerous! Yes, it's never been attempted.
translation.zh: 没错 这很危险 从来没有人尝试过

translation.en: Yes, you're probably gonna die.
translation.zh: 没错 你可能会死

translation.en: But you can do it still.
translation.zh: 但是你还是可以这么做

translation.en: [astronaut] How you doing, Mission Control?
translation.zh: -指挥中心 情况如何？ -没问题

translation.en: -[mission control] Good. -[astronaut] Telcom? Guidance, happy?
translation.zh: -指挥中心 情况如何？ -没问题 -通讯设备呢？ -导航员 高兴了吗？

translation.en: -[CAPCOM] Go! -[astronaut] Final go!
translation.zh: -出发吧！ -确认出发！

translation.en: [CAPCOM] 2,000 feet. 2,000 feet. Into the air, 47 degrees.
translation.zh: 600米 进入大气层 气温八摄氏度

translation.en: [astronaut] Roger.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: [Tim Urban] Does anyone regret going to the Moon?
translation.zh: 有人后悔上月球吗？

translation.en: Does anyone who lived in the 60s say, "What a waste of time,
translation.zh: 20世纪60年代的人会不会说 “真是浪费时间

translation.en: I wish we hadn't done that."? No. Going to the Moon was awesome.
translation.zh: 真希望人类没有上月球”？ 当然没有 登上月球简直太棒了

translation.en: Everyone's happy we went to the Moon! Mars is even cooler.
translation.zh: 大家都很高兴人类登上月球！ 而火星就更酷了

translation.en: [newscaster] Mariner is the spacecraft. Mars is the destination.
translation.zh: 水手号太空船 目的地是火星

translation.en: [newscaster] Americans could once again look up towards their future with faith
translation.zh: 美国人将能再次充满信念和信心

translation.en: and with confidence.
translation.zh: 期待未来

translation.en: We're focused on Mars. That's NASA's ultimate goal.
translation.zh: 我们把重点放在火星 这是美国航空航天总署的终极目标

translation.en: To lead other nations, and particularly ourselves,
translation.zh: 带领其他国家 特别是美国本身

translation.en: with humans to Mars.
translation.zh: 让人类能登上火星

translation.en: [newscaster] The retrograde rockets will be tested in space.
translation.zh: 我们将在太空中测试逆行火箭

translation.en: The antenna housing will transmit telemetry.
translation.zh: 天线罩能传递遥测讯号

translation.en: [Alyssa] Ever since I was little, I've always had a passion for space.
translation.zh: 我从小就对太空充满热情

translation.en: It would be so amazing just to see the Martian surface with my own eyes.
translation.zh: 如果能亲眼见到火星表面 那么就太棒了

translation.en: [mission control] T minus 25 seconds.
translation.zh: 发射倒数25秒

translation.en: We will go to Mars. Let's go out there and explore.
translation.zh: 我们会登上火星 让我们去火星探险吧

translation.en: Let's make discoveries. Let's change the world.
translation.zh: 我们可以去发掘新的世界 改变世界

translation.en: -[camper] Is this the PCS right here? -[camper] OK, the L Cone...
translation.zh: -这是个人通讯设备吗？ -好 L型接收器…

translation.en: [instructor] A couple of things you need to know.
translation.zh: 有几件事必须让你们知道

translation.en: When the launch happens going to Mars, what are we going to say to the press?
translation.zh: 当航天飞机发射前往火星时 我们要怎么跟媒体说？

translation.en: [camper] I mean, I'm sure Neil Armstrong had a ton of time
translation.zh: 我相信阿姆斯特朗当年登上月球

translation.en: to think what his first words would be.
translation.zh: 肯定有很多时间 思考他回来后要说什么

translation.en: I know what I would say. What do we want? [all] Oranges.
translation.zh: 我知道我要说什么 我们想要什么东西？橘子

translation.en: When do we want we want them? Oranges! [instructor] Fantastic. That's a great monologue.
translation.zh: -什么时候需要呢？橘子！ -太赞了 这段独白真棒

translation.en: However, we're going to transition to practicing your checklists now.
translation.zh: 不过我们现在要确认清单

translation.en: Everybody has a checklist that was either on their seat
translation.zh: 每个人手上应该都会有一张清单 可能在你们的座位底下

translation.en: or around their space.
translation.zh: 或是位置附近

translation.en: It's under your suits.
translation.zh: 在你的太空衣下面

translation.en: It's what happens when you start before the mission starts.
translation.zh: 这就是任务正式开始之前 就先来受训的样子

translation.en: Coming to Space Camp is the closest I can really get to space,
translation.zh: 参加太空营 是我真正最能贴近太空的机会

translation.en: at least emotionally and psychologically.
translation.zh: 至少情感上和心理层面都是如此

translation.en: 7A on.
translation.zh: 7A启动

translation.en: [instructor] Do you guys feel good?
translation.zh: 你们还好吗？

translation.en: [Josh] C auto.
translation.zh: C档自动

translation.en: Tank 9. Reset.
translation.zh: 九号槽重启

translation.en: [instructor] This is the suiting up process. We'll transition over.
translation.zh: -这有点像是着装的步骤 -那我们交换一下

translation.en: Grab the book. You got it?
translation.zh: 把书带着 你拿到了吗？

translation.en: [Josh] If people want to call me a space nerd, they can call me a space nerd.
translation.zh: 我不在意人家叫我太空迷

translation.en: And I'll say "Yeah, so what do you want to know about space?
translation.zh: 我会跟他们说 “你们想知道关于太空的什么事？

translation.en: You want to know about SRBs, egress, ECLSS?"
translation.zh: 你们想了解固体火箭助推器、出舱 还是环境控制与生命维持系统？”

translation.en: And they'll be like "What?"
translation.zh: 他们就会说：“啥？”

translation.en: And I'll be like "So, wait, which one did you want to know about?
translation.zh: 然后我就跟他们说 “等等 所以你们到底想知道啥？

translation.en: Cause I can give you at least five,
translation.zh: 因为每件事

translation.en: maybe ten minutes of conversation for each one.
translation.zh: 我都可以至少跟你们讲五分钟 甚至十分钟

translation.en: Come at me, bro!"
translation.zh: 来啊 我不怕你！”

translation.en: -Let me out of this. -Come on, Josh!
translation.zh: -让我出去 -加油 乔许！

translation.en: Today, we were the first group ever to test out this new Mars Mission.
translation.zh: 今天我们是第一批 测试火星任务的队伍

translation.en: [instructor] This mission is a futuristic mission,
translation.zh: 这次的任务是前所未有的突破

translation.en: obviously, because we haven't gone to Mars at this point.
translation.zh: 显然如此 因为目前还没有人上过火星

translation.en: This is MEB, the Mars Elysium Base.
translation.zh: 这是“极乐世界” 也就是火星补给基地

translation.en: And this base has been delivered to Mars already
translation.zh: 这整个基地已经被运送到火星

translation.en: with all the gear that you guys are gonna need to set it up, OK?
translation.zh: 你们上去之后会需要用到的物资 全都在这里 行吗？

translation.en: [Kyle] The Mars Mission is something that they've had in R&D for a while.
translation.zh: 火星任务已经规划设计多时

translation.en: It's exhilarating, the fact that we are simulating a mission to Mars.
translation.zh: 想到我们即将模拟在火星上执行任务 我就太兴奋了

translation.en: [instructor] You got your guy out there. Pull it up.
translation.zh: 你们先派一个人到外面 然后往上拉

translation.en: [Zoe] We are training to go to Mars.
translation.zh: 我们接受训练准备登上火星

translation.en: We know that there will be problems because it is dangerous.
translation.zh: 我们知道一定会有很多问题 因为这个任务很危险

translation.en: We need to have the simulator as close to a nominal mission as possible.
translation.zh: 我们必须尽可能模拟实际任务的情形

translation.en: [Raj] This is gonna be intense!
translation.zh: 这绝对会很刺激！

translation.en: Space Camp was designed to simulate the peak of NASA.
translation.zh: 太空营的设计 是仿照美国航空航天总署的天文台

translation.en: This is cool! Woah!
translation.zh: 这太酷了！

translation.en: [Zoe] Here at Space Camp, we learn a lot about space history
translation.zh: 在太空营 我们学到许多太空历史

translation.en: and what it will be like to be an astronaut.
translation.zh: 以及成为一名宇航员是什么样子

translation.en: All of the simulators here, NASA has been recruited to help design.
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署招募了各路精英 来设计这些模拟器

translation.en: So, they're as close as we can get to what the astronauts actually use.
translation.zh: 尽量让它们和真正的宇航员 实际上用的设备越像越好

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: [Victoria] This is my third year at Space Camp.
translation.zh: 这是我参加太空营的第三年

translation.en: I said, "I'm going to apply for a scholarship,"
translation.zh: 我说：“我要申请一个奖学金”

translation.en: because being an astronaut is something I don't want to give up on.
translation.zh: 因为当宇航员是我不愿意放弃的梦想

translation.en: I'm going up whether I want to or not!
translation.zh: 无论如何我都要上太空！

translation.en: I had to get three letters of recommendation, I had to write two essays,
translation.zh: 我必须拿到三封推荐信 写两篇论文

translation.en: and I had to do a science experiment and break it down in the scientific method.
translation.zh: 还要做科学实验 并且以科学方法论证

translation.en: [instructor] Oh! Good job, Victoria!
translation.zh: 好样的 维多莉亚！

translation.en: [Jace] I believe that the people who come here are the future of the space program.
translation.zh: 我相信来到这里的人 都是宇航界未来的栋梁

translation.en: It's really giving us an education
translation.zh: 这些训练教导我们

translation.en: on how to be a person who works with space on a daily basis.
translation.zh: 如何在太空中工作

translation.en: When I grow up, I would like to be CAPCOM for NASA.
translation.zh: 我长大之后想当美国航空航天总署的 地面通讯主任

translation.en: -I want to become a mission specialist. -Be a machine toolist.
translation.zh: -我想当太空任务专家 -我想当机械技师

translation.en: I want to be an engineer.
translation.zh: 我想当工程师

translation.en: Aerospace engineer.
translation.zh: 航空工程师

translation.en: It would be amazing to construct engines for a mission to Mars.
translation.zh: 如果能替火星任务建造引擎 那将是一件很棒的事

translation.en: When you enter the base and turn on the emergency power,
translation.zh: 当你们进入基地 并且启动紧急电源

translation.en: it turns to red lighting.
translation.zh: 它会显示红灯

translation.en: [instructor] That's what we're wanting...
translation.zh: 对 所以我们要…

translation.en: [Jace] The base that they've designed up there is fascinating.
translation.zh: 他们在这里设计的基地非常厉害

translation.en: The base is all powered down.
translation.zh: 平常基地的电源都被切除

translation.en: They have to turn on the communications array,
translation.zh: 他们必须自行启动通讯站

translation.en: set up the solar panels, set up all of the ECLSS systems,
translation.zh: 设定太阳能面板以及生命维持系统

translation.en: and also set up a greenhouse
translation.zh: 同时搭建一个温室

translation.en: because somebody might want to eat up there.
translation.zh: 因为有人得在火星上种东西吃

translation.en: -[camper] Activate the power. -Hey, guys. The hydro popo is in here.
translation.zh: -启动电源 -各位 水警察来了

translation.en: The fact that people are now even teaching children,
translation.zh: 事实上 现在有很多人

translation.en: 16 year-olds, 15 year-olds,
translation.zh: 都会跟15、16岁的孩子们说

translation.en: saying, "Hey, we're going to Mars" and simulating how it would work out,
translation.zh: “人类要登上火星了” 然后模拟这件事如何成真

translation.en: means they'll grow up and we'll grow up to believe: hey, we're going to Mars.
translation.zh: 这表示在他们和我们长大的过程中 都会深信人类真的能登上火星

translation.en: So let's go to Mars.
translation.zh: 所以我们就上火星吧

translation.en: [camper] I'll go there in a minute.
translation.zh: 我马上过去

translation.en: Well, good luck.
translation.zh: 好吧 祝你好运

translation.en: [male voiceover] Of all the planets in the solar system,
translation.zh: 在太阳系中所有行星之中

translation.en: Earth and Mars, the third and fourth planets from the Sun,
translation.zh: 地球和火星 是距离太阳最近的第三和第四颗行星

translation.en: are the most similar.
translation.zh: 也是最相似的两颗星球

translation.en: But despite the similarities, Mars is essentially like no other planet.
translation.zh: 然而虽然有相似之处 火星毕竟还是独一无二的

translation.en: [Jeffrey Kluger] One of the greatest allures of Mars is that Mars is nearby.
translation.zh: 火星最大的优势在于它离地球很近

translation.en: Mars is a planet, and it's a planet with potential.
translation.zh: 火星是一颗行星 而且是一颗具有潜质的行星

translation.en: It once had water. It once had oceans.
translation.zh: 过去火星上曾经有水 而且曾有海洋出现

translation.en: Surely, we tell ourselves, it once had life.
translation.zh: 当然 我们告诉自己 火星上曾经有生物

translation.en: [male voiceover] Science fiction writers populated the cities
translation.zh: 科幻小说里面写道

translation.en: with terrible creatures of heroic size, with skills beyond earthman's dreams.
translation.zh: 火星上住着可怕的巨型生物 并拥有超乎地球人想象的能力

translation.en: [Kluger] This is a place that touches us in a very basic way.
translation.zh: 火星用最简单的方式触动人心

translation.en: Another thing is that it's always had the power
translation.zh: 而且它总有着一股

translation.en: to scare the daylights out of us.
translation.zh: 令人害怕的力量

translation.en: [Kluger] It was always the blood red world that was just nearby,
translation.zh: 透过天文望远镜 我们看到的邻近火星

translation.en: that, through telescopes, appeared to have canals,
translation.zh: 总是一片血红色的世界 而上面似乎有河道

translation.en: which presumed people or some kind of organisms.
translation.zh: 这表示可能有人类或是其他有机体

translation.en: And since the only model we know for intelligent organisms
translation.zh: 由于我们唯一知道具有智慧的有机体 就是那些科幻小说中

translation.en: is organisms that eventually try to grab land and resources and go to war,
translation.zh: 最后会夺取人类土地及资源 并且和人类开战的外星人

translation.en: Mars used to frighten us.
translation.zh: 我们一度对火星感到惧怕

translation.en: [robot] Welcome to Mars.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到火星

translation.en: [Bill Nye] There's a whole endless string of movies and television shows and stories
translation.zh: 关于外星人或外星物种的 电影、电视剧和故事

translation.en: about aliens, alien life.
translation.zh: 多到数不尽

translation.en: Now, this is the plan: get your ass to Mars.
translation.zh: 计划是这样：快上火星

translation.en: [Urban] When people hear the word "Mars",
translation.zh: 当人们听到“火星”这个词

translation.en: they think of science fiction, of geeks talking about Martians and Mars.
translation.zh: 他们会想到科幻小说 就是一些宅男在说火星人的故事 只要我们上去之后发现有人类 那么一切就会改变

translation.en: And as soon as we go there and there's humans there, that changes.
translation.zh: 只要我们上去之后发现有人类 那么一切就会改变

translation.en: This is not science fiction. This is now something we do.
translation.zh: 这不再是科幻小说 而是我们正在做的事 是现代生活

translation.en: This is part of life. This is real.
translation.zh: 这不再是科幻小说 而是我们正在做的事 是现代生活 这是真实的

translation.en: [Andy Weir] I had no idea that The Martian would have mainstream appeal.
translation.zh: 我不知道《火星救援》 会这么受到主流市场的欢迎

translation.en: It never even occurred to me.
translation.zh: 我从来没想过

translation.en: I thought I was writing it for this tiny niche audience of hardcore space dorks.
translation.zh: 我以为只会吸引到一群小众的观众 就是那些超迷太空的宅男怪人

translation.en: [Kluger] We fell in love with Mars a long, long time ago
translation.zh: 我们从很久以前就爱上火星了

translation.en: and our goal now is to be a part of Mars, is to live on Mars.
translation.zh: 而我们现在的目标是 成为火星的一部分 住在火星上

translation.en: [Urban] Doing something as hard as going to Mars doesn't just happen.
translation.zh: 登上火星这种难事并非一蹴而就

translation.en: You need like a perfect storm in many ways.
translation.zh: 必须具备天时、地利、人和

translation.en: You need the right moment with the right funding,
translation.zh: 必须在对的时刻 有足够的资金

translation.en: with the right people or person.
translation.zh: 还要有对的人

translation.en: [Nye] Wernher von Braun is a famous German scientist
translation.zh: （亨茨维尔第一公民韦纳冯布劳恩出 借华盛顿） 冯布劳恩是知名的德国科学家

translation.en: and he took these ideas about how to operate liquid-fueled rockets
translation.zh: 他利用液体燃料火箭的概念

translation.en: and he made these extraordinary spacecraft
translation.zh: 打造出的卓越非凡的载人太空船

translation.en: that went on to put humans on the Moon.
translation.zh: 成功将人类送上月球

translation.en: [Charles Bolden] Wernher von Braun, when he designed and built the Apollo program,
translation.zh: 当年冯布劳恩设计建造阿波罗计划时

translation.en: in the back of his mind already, he was way past Apollo.
translation.zh: 他内心的想法早已超越了阿波罗

translation.en: He and his team were talking about: how do we get to Mars?
translation.zh: 他和他的团队当时已经在思考 我们要怎么登上火星？

translation.en: We knew that the city of Huntsville was solidly behind us,
translation.zh: 我们知道亨茨维尔市 一直是我们最强大的后盾

translation.en: and with your continued support
translation.zh: 只要有你们持续地支持

translation.en: I will see you back in orbit with that new space station,
translation.zh: 我们将打造新的太空站

translation.en: to which we will all ride in the reusable launch vehicle,
translation.zh: 并让人类搭乘可重复使用的发射工具

translation.en: and maybe one day we'll have a man on Mars.
translation.zh: 或许有一天人类可以登上火星

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Annie Jacobsen] Von Braun was a Nazi.
translation.zh: 冯布劳恩曾是纳粹的一员

translation.en: Von Braun was in the SS,
translation.zh: 他是党卫军成员

translation.en: which is the dreaded element of the Nazi party.
translation.zh: 也就是德国纳粹党中 令人闻风丧胆的队伍

translation.en: And von Braun was Hitler's top weapons maker.
translation.zh: 而且冯布劳恩曾是希特勒手下 首席的武器制造专家

translation.en: [Kluger] From a man who held a dark and hateful cause,
translation.zh: 他原本替充满黑暗与仇恨的一方工作

translation.en: came a missile that gave America
translation.zh: 后来替美国制造了

translation.en: one of its greatest historical inspirations.
translation.zh: 一颗在历史上具有重要地位的飞弹

translation.en: So Wernher von Braun is...a mixed bag.
translation.zh: 所以冯布劳恩其实是矛盾的混合体

translation.en: -[camper] You tightened the valves? -[camper] It works.
translation.zh: （冯布劳恩的土星五号火箭） -阀门拧紧了吗？ -成功了

translation.en: [Raj] Dude, wherever I cut one I should cut the other, right?
translation.zh: 老兄 只要我切断其中一边 就得把另外一边也切掉 对吧？

translation.en: [camper] Yeah.
translation.zh: -没错 -所以你觉得呢？

translation.en: [Raj] So what do you say? One, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四、五、六

translation.en: How about six runs up and six runs up?
translation.zh: 不如就由下到上数六条 然后再数六条吧？

translation.en: So it's one, two, three four. So it's the fourth one down.
translation.zh: 所以是一、二、三、四 从上面数来第四条

translation.en: If you could combine nerdy and cool, I hope you could get something like me.
translation.zh: 如果把宅和酷两者相结合 那就是我本人了吧

translation.en: How's it going?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: It's a little rough. The X-Acto knife slipped twice, as you can see.
translation.zh: 目前还是不太成熟 如你所见 美工刀不小心切坏两次

translation.en: -Just got little duct tape bandages. -Here, use better duct tape.
translation.zh: -就拿封箱胶带贴起来就好 -用好一点的胶带

translation.en: Yeah, that's a good point.
translation.zh: 对 好主意

translation.en: Nerdiness has kind of taken a bad rap over the years.
translation.zh: 多年来 宅男一直饱受攻击

translation.en: And nerdy is the new cool.
translation.zh: 现在宅男当道 大家觉得很酷

translation.en: But that doesn't mean you have to start wearing Jordans or anything.
translation.zh: 但这不表示宅男得开始穿乔丹球鞋

translation.en: But I feel like the egg should be standing up in the compartment, though.
translation.zh: 可是我觉得鸡蛋应该要竖着放

translation.en: -[camper] It will. -Like standing vertically.
translation.zh: -会的 -就是垂直地站着

translation.en: -[camper] I know. -[Raj] All right, cool.
translation.zh: -我知道 -好 那就好

translation.en: I'm hoping one day to run for office and work my way up in Washington,
translation.zh: 我希望有一天能在华盛顿工作 然后逐步往上爬

translation.en: and ultimately get NASA the funding it needs
translation.zh: 最后帮助美国航空航天总署 获得执行火星探险这种优秀计划

translation.en: to, you know, do these great things like go to Mars.
translation.zh: 所需要的经费

translation.en: We usually just, I think we should fold it in a way that it will definitely deploy.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们折叠的方式 一定要保证之后可以再散开

translation.en: The model rockets is a good challenge for the group.
translation.zh: 火箭模型对团队而言 是一个很好的挑战

translation.en: Of course, rocketry is directly connected with NASA.
translation.zh: 火箭研究跟航空航天总署直接相关

translation.en: [Josh] So the awesome thing about rockets, I'd say,
translation.zh: 所以我认为 火箭最酷的地方在于

translation.en: is that they're handing explosives
translation.zh: 它们是由爆炸物组成

translation.en: and a whole bunch of, like, firing power to teenagers.
translation.zh: 而这么强大的火力 就掌握在一群青少年手中

translation.en: And they're like, "Here, go make it, go up into the air
translation.zh: 他们告诉我们 “来 你们去做能飞上空的火箭

translation.en: and if it explodes, have fun with it."
translation.zh: 如果爆炸了 那就玩得开心点”

translation.en: So it's, like, yeah, I'm definitely going to do this.
translation.zh: 所以我肯定要把握这个机会好好玩

translation.en: We're gonna have to find a way for it to disconnect
translation.zh: 我们必须想办法让它断开

translation.en: while keeping the shot cord inside of the body... -Oh yeah, definitely. -Somehow...
translation.zh: 同时发射绳还是要在火箭体中…

translation.en: [Victoria] I enjoy building rockets.
translation.zh: 我很享受建造火箭的过程

translation.en: Later today we are launching our rocket with our eggstronaut Egbert in it.
translation.zh: 晚一点我们就要发射自己做的火箭了 载着用鸡蛋代替的宇航员蛋伯

translation.en: And it has been so much fun just building it and tossing around ideas.
translation.zh: 光是跟大家建造火箭并分享意见 我就觉得非常好玩

translation.en: Put the hot glue on the edges of these and stick it down.
translation.zh: 把热熔胶涂在边缘然后往下黏

translation.en: [Jace] The two things you're learning from these model rockets
translation.zh: 建造火箭模型可以学到两件事

translation.en: is crew survivability and aerodynamics.
translation.zh: 那就是船员生存性和气体力学

translation.en: Everything else is intact. We just can't get this stuff tangled up.
translation.zh: 我觉得其他部分都没问题 但我们不能任由这玩意缠在一起

translation.en: As soon as this gets tangled, we're kind of done.
translation.zh: 只要这东西缠住 我们就完蛋了

translation.en: -[Raj] Let's see how this drop goes. -[camper] High check, science geeks.
translation.zh: -看这次降落的情形如何 -加油 科学宅男们

translation.en: [instructor] Very nice.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: [Jace] You have to keep your precious payload alive,
translation.zh: 必须保护好宝贵的装载物

translation.en: and you want it to pierce through the air in a beautiful parabolic trajectory.
translation.zh: 然后希望它能 以优美的抛物线轨迹穿越空气

translation.en: That fits there really well.
translation.zh: 这配合得刚刚好

translation.en: It's really important that we see the big picture.
translation.zh: 我们必须有宏观的思维 这点非常重要

translation.en: It's important that the whole system, including our eggstronaut,
translation.zh: 重要的是 整个系统 包括我们的太空蛋人

translation.en: are safe and reliable.
translation.zh: 都必须安全稳当

translation.en: [Raj] No, no, no. That means we have 250 left.
translation.zh: 不 这表示我们还有250美元

translation.en: -[Josh] And then we have 150-- -[Raj] 150 left.
translation.zh: -然后我们还有150… -剩下150美元

translation.en: [Josh] And then we just used 100 for the motor tube. So we would have 50.
translation.zh: 接着我们刚才用掉100元做发动机 所以只剩下50美元

translation.en: [Raj] In our engineering challenges, we're assigned a budget for what we do
translation.zh: 我们的工程挑战是有规定预算的

translation.en: and you can't overspend it.
translation.zh: 而且绝对不能超支

translation.en: And sometimes you don't even have enough to begin with.
translation.zh: 有时候 光是一开始钱就不够了

translation.en: Dude, we made a mistake for the first item.
translation.zh: 老兄 我们第一项就错了

translation.en: This 150 is actually 200.
translation.zh: 这里的150美元 应该是200美元才对

translation.en: So then now we're left with 100.
translation.zh: 所以现在我们还有100美元

translation.en: The money is a big constriction for humans in real life.
translation.zh: 在现实生活中 金钱是人类很大的限制

translation.en: So, they decided to make it a constriction for us, too.
translation.zh: 所以他们决定让金钱成为我们的限制

translation.en: How much money have we spent?
translation.zh: 我们花了多少钱？

translation.en: Jace, I'm gonna go glue these together, OK?
translation.zh: -杰斯 我去把这些黏起来 行吗？ -好的

translation.en: They put a limit on it to say,
translation.zh: 他们给了我们限制 并且说

translation.en: "Hey, we're not gonna give you all the materials,
translation.zh: “我们不会给你们所有需要的材料

translation.en: because if we did you could do so much."
translation.zh: 因为这样的话 你们能做的事就太多了”

translation.en: [Raj] So the way these rocket engines work is it propels downwards.
translation.zh: 火箭引擎驱动的方法是向下推进

translation.en: When we deploy it, the parachute's gonna unfurl
translation.zh: 当我们把它放开的时候 降落伞就会自动展开

translation.en: and it's gonna float down like this.
translation.zh: 然后像这样在空中飘浮

translation.en: And our egg's gonna survive.
translation.zh: 然后我们的蛋就可以全身而退

translation.en: Good stuff, guys! This was a productive session.
translation.zh: 好样的 大家！这次有很大的进展

translation.en: [Josh] Ballin' till we drop!
translation.zh: 还没发射之前都要好好加油！

translation.en: [Kluger] The V2 rocket was built by Wernher von Braun
translation.zh: V2火箭由冯布劳恩

translation.en: and his team of engineers.
translation.zh: 和他的工程师团队一起打造

translation.en: It hits randomly.
translation.zh: 它毫无目的地发射

translation.en: You don't really know what you're hitting, what you're killing,
translation.zh: 你并不知道它会击中什么 也不知道会害死多少人

translation.en: what you're destroying.
translation.zh: 摧毁多少东西

translation.en: That was what the V2 did.
translation.zh: 那就是V2火箭所做的

translation.en: The "V", for goodness' sake, stood for "Vengeance".
translation.zh: V这个字母代表英文的“复仇”

translation.en: It was the weapon that resulted from a tantrum,
translation.zh: 那是人在盛怒之下制造出来的武器

translation.en: in this case the tantrum of the führer.
translation.zh: 当时指的就是德国纳粹的元首希特勒

translation.en: He wanted to lash back, as all losing causes do.
translation.zh: 如同所有走向败局的一方 他想要反击

translation.en: They flail at the end.
translation.zh: 殊死挣扎

translation.en: [newscaster] The President of the United States.
translation.zh: 来自美国总统的发言

translation.en: General Eisenhower informs me
translation.zh: 艾森豪将军告知我

translation.en: that the forces of Germany have surrendered to the United Nations.
translation.zh: 德国军队已向联合国投降

translation.en: The flags of freedom fly all over Europe.
translation.zh: 欧洲各地挥舞着象征自由的旗帜

translation.en: [Jacobsen] At the end of World War II,
translation.zh: 在二次大战尾声

translation.en: the Cold War had, in essence, already begun.
translation.zh: 事实上 冷战已经开始了

translation.en: It was clear to the Allies that we could not coexist with the Soviets.
translation.zh: 同盟国非常清楚 我们和苏维埃政权无法并存

translation.en: If we didn't get von Braun, then the Soviets would.
translation.zh: 如果我们不抓冯布劳恩 那么苏维埃政府肯定会抓他

translation.en: We had to have him.
translation.zh: 我们必须找到他

translation.en: [Neil deGrasse Tyson] Oh my gosh!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: How soon we forget
translation.zh: 我们怎么会

translation.en: how evil the communist empire was perceived to be
translation.zh: 这么快就忘记 当初人们眼中的共产帝国

translation.en: in that day and in that time.
translation.zh: 是多么地邪恶

translation.en: And how much of a motivating factor that was to do anything we could
translation.zh: 而我们当时是如何拼尽全力

translation.en: to not be bested by our arch enemy.
translation.zh: 想尽办法别被我们的大敌击败

translation.en: [Bolden] Not a lot of Americans know that we took a...a Nazi,
translation.zh: 很多美国人并不知道 我们接纳了一名德国纳粹分子

translation.en: someone who helped designed rockets that were intended to kill us,
translation.zh: 而且还是曾经协助制造 用来杀害我们的火箭的人

translation.en: relocated him and his team eventually to Huntsville, Alabama,
translation.zh: 我们最后决定将他和他的团队 安置在阿拉巴马州的亨茨维尔市

translation.en: where they became founding fathers of the spaceflight program.
translation.zh: 他们在那里成为了 开创美国航天飞行计划的元老

translation.en: [Jacobsen] He became such a vocal figurehead
translation.zh: 他后来成了航空界

translation.en: for space, for exploration, for the red planet.
translation.zh: 太空探险和火星的最佳代言人

translation.en: In the early to middle '50s, von Braun became famous.
translation.zh: 20世纪50年代早期至中期 冯布劳恩变得相当有名

translation.en: He began writing long magazine articles about travel to the Moon and to Mars.
translation.zh: 他开始在杂志上发表长篇文章 写一些关于到月球和火星旅行的事情

translation.en: And he even signed a deal with Disney.
translation.zh: 他甚至和迪士尼公司签约

translation.en: [von Braun with strong German accent] When the day arrives for construction to begin,
translation.zh: 等到正式开始建造的那一天

translation.en: the thousands of parts for the space station
translation.zh: 太空站所需要的上千项零件

translation.en: will be transported to the orbit by our multistage rockets.
translation.zh: 将会利用我们的多节火箭运送上太空

translation.en: It's a real moment in American history
translation.zh: 那是美国历史性的一刻

translation.en: when 42 million Americans tune in
translation.zh: 四千两百万美国人

translation.en: to watch von Braun talk on a Disney television program
translation.zh: 全守在电视机前面 看冯布劳恩在迪士尼的电视节目上

translation.en: about space travel.
translation.zh: 谈论太空旅行

translation.en: [von Braun] If we were to start today on an organized and well supported space program,
translation.zh: 如果我们现在就开始 有组织地支持发展太空计划

translation.en: I believe a practical passenger rocket could be built and tested within 10 years.
translation.zh: 我相信十年之内 我们就能建造并试射载人火箭

translation.en: [newscaster] Today, a new moon is in the sky,
translation.zh: 今日 天空中出现了新的月亮

translation.en: a 23 inch metal sphere placed in orbit by a Russian rocket.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯制造的火箭 把近60厘米的金属球体发射至太空

translation.en: 500 miles up, the artificial moon is boosted
translation.zh: 距离地面800多公里之上 人造的月球

translation.en: to a speed counterbalancing the pull of gravity,
translation.zh: 以能够和地心引力相抗衡的速度

translation.en: and released.
translation.zh: 被发射进入太空轨道

translation.en: The whole applecart was overturned when the Russians put Sputnik into orbit,
translation.zh: 当俄国发射史普尼克卫星之后 美国的计划被全盘打乱

translation.en: causing a national nervous breakdown as a consequence.
translation.zh: 结果导致全国上下都崩溃了

translation.en: The Soviets had Sputnik up in the sky and you could hear the beeping going by.
translation.zh: 苏维埃政府发射史普尼克卫星到太空 人们仿佛可以听到它发出的哔哔声

translation.en: The entire country was in shock by Sputnik.
translation.zh: 整个美国都被史普尼克卫星震慑了

translation.en: [Nye] Sputnik orbited the Earth on what you would say in military terms
translation.zh: 史普尼克卫星成功发射环绕地球 以军事术语来说

translation.en: was the ultimate high ground of space!
translation.zh: 是俄国在太空中取得了战略先机

translation.en: [newscaster] The reaction was one of astonishment and concern.
translation.zh: 美国政府的反应是既震惊又忧心

translation.en: For it was now known that a potential enemy
translation.zh: 因为现在他们知道 俄国这个潜在的敌人

translation.en: was at least temporarily ahead in developing means for space travel.
translation.zh: 在太空旅行的发展上暂时超前

translation.en: We were scared to death when Sputnik went up.
translation.zh: 史普尼克卫星上太空之后 我们怕得要死

translation.en: And then we were scared to death
translation.zh: 接着俄国再发射载人火箭上太空

translation.en: when the Russians beat us to orbit with a human.
translation.zh: 我们又一次怕得要死

translation.en: [Nye] It seemed at once that this competitive style of government
translation.zh: 当时世人一度认为 好胜心强的俄国政府

translation.en: was producing technology faster, outstripping the United States.
translation.zh: 科技进步神速 甚至超越美国

translation.en: And so, a civilian space agency was formed,
translation.zh: 因此美国成立了 实施民用航空计划及太空研究的组织

translation.en: and that's the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, NASA.
translation.zh: 那就是美国国家航空航天局 简称NASA

translation.en: Welcome to the Marshall Space Flight Center.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到马歇尔太空飞行中心

translation.en: Our special task here in Huntsville
translation.zh: 在亨茨维尔市

translation.en: is to develop the rocket powered systems necessary
translation.zh: 我们的特殊任务就是 发展出火箭动力系统

translation.en: to orbit man in an Earth satellite.
translation.zh: 我们的特殊任务就是 发展出火箭动力系统 让人类能乘坐地球卫星上太空

translation.en: You might say we are the long distance movers.
translation.zh: 你可以称我们为长途旅行者

translation.en: [Jacobsen] All effort was given toward making sure that America got into space pronto.
translation.zh: 美国几乎尽了全力 以确保能尽快把人送上太空

translation.en: And that is where von Braun began his ascent
translation.zh: 就是那时候冯布劳恩

translation.en: as kind of the American space savior.
translation.zh: 开始成为美国的太空救星

translation.en: And from there, he became the prophet of space exploration.
translation.zh: 至此之后 他开始宣扬太空探索的好处

translation.en: For we meet in an hour of change and challenge,
translation.zh: 因为我们身处于 这个瞬息万变又充满挑战的时刻

translation.en: in a decade of hope and fear,
translation.zh: 这个满怀希望又心生恐惧的年代

translation.en: in an age of both knowledge and ignorance.
translation.zh: 这个拥有知识又懵懂无知的世代

translation.en: The greater our knowledge increases, the greater our ignorance unfolds.
translation.zh: 我们获取的知识越多 就更显得我们的无知

translation.en: [Jacobsen] When you think of the Apollo program,
translation.zh: 当你想到阿波罗计划

translation.en: when you think of man on the Moon,
translation.zh: 当你想到人类登上月球

translation.en: no doubt von Braun is a huge piece of JFK's legacy.
translation.zh: 冯布劳恩在肯尼迪政权的辉煌时代 毋庸置疑地扮演了重要角色

translation.en: [JFK] The vast stretches of the unknown,
translation.zh: 广大的未知

translation.en: and the unanswered,
translation.zh: 宇宙未解的谜团

translation.en: and the unfinished,
translation.zh: 以及未完成的研究

translation.en: still far outstrip our collective comprehension.
translation.zh: 依然超乎我们众人的理解

translation.en: To be the first person on Mars, it would definitely put you up there
translation.zh: 身为第一批上火星的人

translation.en: with those big names that most people know about space.
translation.zh: 你肯定能和太空界的伟大人物齐名

translation.en: Alan Shepard, Yuri Gagarin, Neil Armstrong, and von Braun.
translation.zh: 艾伦谢泼德、尤里加加林 阿姆斯特朗和冯布劳恩

translation.en: It would definitely come with a bit of infamy.
translation.zh: 确实可能也会有点负面的声音

translation.en: [JFK] Surely the opening vistas of space promise high costs and hardships,
translation.zh: 太空探险当然需要投入 高额的经费和高度的努力

translation.en: as well as high reward.
translation.zh: 不过投资回报率也很高

translation.en: So, it is not surprising
translation.zh: 因此不出意外 我们会待在太空营

translation.en: that some would have us stay where we are a little longer,
translation.zh: 接受稍微长时间的训练

translation.en: to rest, to wait.
translation.zh: 休息并等待

translation.en: To be sure, we are behind, and will be behind for some time,
translation.zh: 在载人太空飞行的领域 我们确实落后

translation.en: in manned flight.
translation.zh: 而且可能会落后一阵子

translation.en: But we do not intend to stay behind,
translation.zh: 但我们不会就此罢休

translation.en: and in this decade we shall make up and move ahead.
translation.zh: 接下来的十年内我们将急起直追

translation.en: [Todd May] Building something from scratch is a double-edged sword.
translation.zh: 从无到有创造一样东西是个双面刃

translation.en: You can't design a perfect launch vehicle from scratch
translation.zh: 你不可能凭空设计出完美的运载火箭

translation.en: and put it up on the pad the very first time
translation.zh: 然后期望它第一次发射飞行

translation.en: and expect things are gonna go well.
translation.zh: 就一切顺利

translation.en: This generation does not intend
translation.zh: 对于即将到来的太空时代

translation.en: to founder in the backwash of the coming age of space.
translation.zh: 我们这一代的人 不想成为浪潮中的失败者

translation.en: We mean to be a part of it. We mean to lead it.
translation.zh: 我们要参与进去 我们要引领太空研究

translation.en: Since NASA was formed in 1958,
translation.zh: 自1958年成立 美国航空航天总署以来

translation.en: we've had a pretty small number of different missions
translation.zh: 我们执行过的不同任务

translation.en: that we've undertaken.
translation.zh: 其实为数并不多

translation.en: The first program was the Mercury program,
translation.zh: 第一个任务是水星计划

translation.en: just to see if an astronaut could survive in zero gravity.
translation.zh: 目标只是看看宇航员 是否能在零重力的情况下存活

translation.en: This is Flagship 7, radio loud and clear. Over.
translation.zh: 这里是旗舰七号 无线电很大声很清楚

translation.en: [Dr. Don Thomas] We went on to the Gemini program, sending two astronauts up in a capsule.
translation.zh: 接着我们执行了双子座计划 用双载的飞船送了两名宇航员上去

translation.en: We learned how to do rendezvous and docking.
translation.zh: 我们学会如何进行太空会合和对接

translation.en: And we learned how to walk in space, to float there.
translation.zh: 而且我们学会了 如何在太空上走路和漂浮

translation.en: [astronaut] OK, yeah?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: [astronaut] You're right in front, Ed. You look beautiful!
translation.zh: 你就在我前面 艾德 你太美了！

translation.en: [White] I feel like a million dollars! So I'm gonna kick off!
translation.zh: 我觉得自己仿佛有百万身价！ 我要出发了！

translation.en: [Dr. Thomas] We put together everything we learned from Mercury and Gemini in the Apollo program.
translation.zh: 我们结合在水星和双子座计划 学到的所有知识 发展出阿波罗计划

translation.en: [JFK] But why, some say, the Moon? Why choose this as our goal?
translation.zh: 但有些人会问 为什么是月球？ 为什么选择月球作为目标？

translation.en: And they may well ask, why climb the highest mountain?
translation.zh: 而他们可能也会问 为什么要挑战最艰巨的任务？

translation.en: [mission control] Liftoff! We have a liftoff!
translation.zh: 发射！火箭发射！

translation.en: [JFK] Many years ago, the great British explorer George Mallory,
translation.zh: 很多年前 伟大的英国探险家 乔治马洛里

translation.en: who was to die on Mount Everest, was asked why did he want to climb it.
translation.zh: 在爬珠穆朗玛峰的时候差点丧生 有人问他为什么要爬这么高的山

translation.en: He said "Because it is there."
translation.zh: 他说：“因为它就在那里”

translation.en: Well, space is there, and we're going to climb it.
translation.zh: 太空就在那里 所以我们要去挑战它

translation.en: And the Moon and the planets are there.
translation.zh: 月球和其他星球也在那里

translation.en: And new hopes for knowledge and peace are there!
translation.zh: 获取知识与和平的新希望也在那里

translation.en: Going to the Moon, many people just considered outright impossible.
translation.zh: 很多人认为 登上月球完全就是不可能的事

translation.en: [astronaut] Four forward, drifting to the right a little.
translation.zh: 再往前一点 稍微偏左边

translation.en: [deGrasse Tyson] Once the impossible becomes possible,
translation.zh: 当不可能成为可能

translation.en: that opens the floodgates of human imagination.
translation.zh: 人类想像力的界限就此被打开

translation.en: That's one small step for man,
translation.zh: 这是我的一小步

translation.en: one giant leap for mankind.
translation.zh: 人类的一大步

translation.en: [JFK] We choose to go to the Moon! We choose to go to the Moon!
translation.zh: 我们选择登上月球！

translation.en: We choose to go to the Moon in this decade and do the other things,
translation.zh: 在这十年之内 我们选择登上月球 还有很多事情

translation.en: not because they are easy, but because they are hard.
translation.zh: 并不是因为这些事很容易 而是因为它们很困难

translation.en: [Raj] We should probably check it, cause last time we had a pretty bad angle.
translation.zh: 我们或许应该检查一下 因为上次的角度很差

translation.en: Dude, come on, let's check it.
translation.zh: 老兄 快点 我们检查一下

translation.en: No, I just want to make sure ours is positioned so we won't die again.
translation.zh: 不 我只想确认我们的火箭位置正确 这样我们才不会又死一次

translation.en: As a kid, I would love to witness one of our presidents
translation.zh: 从小我就喜欢看我们的总统 对美国航空航天总署提出挑战

translation.en: challenge NASA to land on Mars in a deadline that may seem impossible.
translation.zh: 要他们在看似不可能的时限内 想办法降落在火星

translation.en: Because I feel like few things motivate humans.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得能激励人类进步的事不多

translation.en: I mean the Soviets motivated us, but that was out of fear.
translation.zh: 我是说 苏维埃政府激励了我们 但那是出自于惧怕

translation.en: I swear, if ours doesn't work
translation.zh: 我发誓 如果我们的火箭失败

translation.en: -I'm crying! -Oh crap, dude!
translation.zh: -我会哭！ -糟糕 老兄！

translation.en: Ours looks all bent up and everything. What is he doing?
translation.zh: 我们的火箭看起来都歪掉了 他在干吗？

translation.en: Dude, now look at it! We're bent to the side now. Oh my god.
translation.zh: 老兄 你看！ 我们的火箭歪到旁边了 天啊

translation.en: -[camper] It's going to go that way. -[camper]...two, one...
translation.zh: -肯定会歪到那边去 -二、一

translation.en: -Please, please deploy! -Do it, do it, do it!
translation.zh: -拜托 一定要展开！ -快点！

translation.en: [all] Yeah!
[all] Rub the orange! Rub the orange! Rub the orange!
translation.zh: 摸一下橘子

translation.en: [Raj] I think we should go to Mars because we would learn so much along the way.
translation.zh: 我认为我们应该上火星 因为在过程中我们会学到很多

translation.en: Forget about actually stepping on Mars.
translation.zh: 先别说真正踏到火星的土地上

translation.en: I think the journey there is far more important.
translation.zh: 我觉得通往火星的旅程才是更重要的

translation.en: We're checking the payload to see if it's still intact.
translation.zh: 我们在确认上面的装载的物品 是否还完好无缺

translation.en: See any juice?
translation.zh: 有流出汁来吗？

translation.en: This chute idea might have saved us.
translation.zh: 这个降落伞的点子可能救了我们

translation.en: It's cracked.
translation.zh: 蛋裂了

translation.en: No! I think we made it! Oh my god, we made it!
translation.zh: 没有啦！我想我们成功了！ 天啊！我们成功了！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Raj] Wow, that was so ratchet.
translation.zh: 天啊 吓死我了

translation.en: [Eugene Cernan] Bob, this is Gene and I'm on the surface.
translation.zh: 鲍伯 我是金恩 我在月球表面上

translation.en: I'd like to just say, what I believe history will record:
translation.zh: 我只想说 我相信历史会记载这一切

translation.en: that America's challenge of today
translation.zh: 今日美国的挑战

translation.en: has forged man's destiny of tomorrow.
translation.zh: 造就了明日人类的命运

translation.en: As soon as the first landing on the Moon seemed inevitable,
translation.zh: 一旦登陆月球这件事变得无可避免

translation.en: and certainly after it happened,
translation.zh: 而且真正发生之后

translation.en: every single story written about that success
translation.zh: 每个关于人类成功登陆月球的故事

translation.en: included a secondary story that said "So, what's next?"
translation.zh: 一定都会有接续的问题 “那下一步是什么？”

translation.en: [Cernan] And as we leave the Moon at Taurus-Littrow,
translation.zh: 我们在月球的最后一站 是陶拉斯利特罗峡谷

translation.en: we leave as we came
translation.zh: 我们登陆之后离开

translation.en: and, God willing, as we shall return:
translation.zh: 顺利的话 我们会再回来

translation.en: with peace and hope for all mankind.
translation.zh: 带着全人类的和平与希望回来

translation.en: God speed the crew of Apollo 17.
translation.zh: 阿波罗17号全体成员一路平安

translation.en: [Jacobsen] In that moment, von Braun reveals his true ambition as a scientist.
translation.zh: 在那个时候 冯布劳恩展现出 身为一名科学家真正的野心

translation.en: This is a great moment. We've gotten to the Moon.
translation.zh: 这是非常棒的时刻 我们登上了月球

translation.en: But actually it's a stepping stone to the red planet, to Mars.
translation.zh: 但事实上这只是登陆火星的垫脚石

translation.en: [Kluger] Wernher von Braun talked about a Mars mission
translation.zh: 冯布劳恩曾经谈论过火星任务

translation.en: and he talked about a possible presence, permanent presence, on Mars by 1981.
translation.zh: 他说到了1981年 人类就可能登上火星并且长住

translation.en: That sounds insanely ambitious:
translation.zh: 这份雄心壮志听起来很疯狂

translation.en: 11 years to have a permanent presence on two planets.
translation.zh: 11年内就要能在两个星球上长住

translation.en: But the fact is, it was equally hubristic to say
translation.zh: 但事实是 当他说 “我们1969年就会送人上月球”

translation.en: "And we're gonna put a man on the Moon by 1969."
translation.zh: 这样的说法听起来同样傲慢

translation.en: Except we did it.
translation.zh: 而我们却真的做到了

translation.en: So everything we were talking about doing in extremely short order, by 1981,
translation.zh: 因此在我们成功登陆月球之后

translation.en: getting people on Mars,
translation.zh: 当我们谈论到

translation.en: was actually perfectly consistent with the extremely short order work
translation.zh: 接下来短时间内的目标 是1981年送人上火星

translation.en: we had done to get to the Moon.
translation.zh: 这事实上跟之前计划的可行性 完全一致

translation.en: [Jacobsen] The plan to go to Mars was complicated in the '60s
translation.zh: 在20世纪60年代 登上火星的计划很复杂

translation.en: because the way von Braun saw it, this was gonna be a symbol of the future.
translation.zh: 因为在冯布劳恩看来 这是未来的象征

translation.en: But the way the public interpreted it was entirely different.
translation.zh: 可是大众解读的方式截然不同

translation.en: Now, of course, there are many other things competing for public interest.
translation.zh: 当然 现今社会 有许多其他事情关乎公众利益

translation.en: There is an election coming up, and there is a war going on in Vietnam,
translation.zh: 选举在即 越南正在发生战争

translation.en: and there are problems in the cities.
translation.zh: 我们国内也有很多问题

translation.en: And quite a few people seem to believe
translation.zh: 而很多人似乎认为

translation.en: that we are taking money away from the public purse.
translation.zh: 我们是在花纳税人的钱

translation.en: We prefer to see our space program in a somewhat different light.
translation.zh: 我们希望用不同的角度 看待我们的太空计划

translation.en: We believe that we are actually producing values,
translation.zh: 我们相信这是一件能创造价值的事

translation.en: and we are producing values
translation.zh: 而且我们创造价值的速度

translation.en: at a faster rate than we are taking money out of the treasury.
translation.zh: 远超过我们花费公款的速度

translation.en: [Kluger] Nixon had a choice to continue the program to go on to Mars.
translation.zh: 尼克松总统曾经有机会 决定是否继续进行火星计划

translation.en: The infrastructure for planetary exploration was in place.
translation.zh: 当时星球探险的基础架构全准备好了

translation.en: The NASA personnel infrastructure that had gotten us to the Moon
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署的专人组织 当初带领我们登陆月球的团队

translation.en: was prepared to get us to Mars.
translation.zh: 也准备好带我们上火星了

translation.en: Mr. Speaker, the President of the United States!
translation.zh: 欢迎演讲者 美国总统！

translation.en: [Nye] I gotta tell you, everybody,
translation.zh: 各位 我必须告诉你们

translation.en: this longing for the Apollo era is not well advised.
translation.zh: 所谓对于阿波罗时代的引颈期盼 并未经过周详的考虑

translation.en: It's not coming back.
translation.zh: 辉煌的时代不再

translation.en: We're operating now not under the Kennedy doctrine,
translation.zh: 我们已经不是在肯尼迪的政权之下

translation.en: but under the Nixon doctrine.
translation.zh: 而是尼克松政府上台

translation.en: In reaching the Moon, we demonstrated
translation.zh: 人类为了登陆月球

translation.en: what miracles American technology is capable of achieving.
translation.zh: 证实了美国科技足以创造奇迹

translation.en: And now the time has come to move more deliberately
translation.zh: 而现在我们必须更谨慎行事

translation.en: toward making full use of that technology here on Earth.
translation.zh: 将这样的科技充分地运用在地球上

translation.en: [Nye] President Nixon and his advisors
translation.zh: 尼克松总统和他的幕僚认为

translation.en: felt that U.S. public interest in space exploration had waned.
translation.zh: 在太空探险的过程中 美国人民的公众利益逐渐亏损

translation.en: It was a very expensive undertaking. Let's do something else.
translation.zh: 这件事非常昂贵 我们做点别的事吧

translation.en: [newscaster] Sunday, April 12, 1981. Kennedy Space Center, Florida.
translation.zh: 1981年4月12日 星期天 佛罗里达州 肯尼迪太空中心

translation.en: The Space Shuttle.
translation.zh: 航天飞机

translation.en: Fourteen stories high, 2,000 tons, poised on the pad for its maiden flight.
translation.zh: 14层楼高 重达两千吨 在发射台上准备进行处女航

translation.en: [Kluger] Nixon's goal was to contract America's space footprint.
translation.zh: 尼克松的目标是缩短美国的太空足迹

translation.en: To make getting to and from orbit routine, affordable,
translation.zh: 让往返太空这件事变得可以负担

translation.en: and ultimately profitable.
translation.zh: 最后甚至能创造收益

translation.en: But the Nixon doctrine,
translation.zh: 不过尼克松政府

translation.en: the idea of monetizing and simplifying access to orbit,
translation.zh: 他们企图货币化财政赤字 并且简化太空计划

translation.en: did not work.
translation.zh: 这个想法并未实现

translation.en: [mission control] ...two, one, starting motor ignition and liftoff!
translation.zh: 二、一 发动机点火 发射！

translation.en: Liftoff of Columbia!
translation.zh: 哥伦比亚号发射！

translation.en: The shuttle has cleared the tower.
translation.zh: 航天飞机离开发射塔

translation.en: Columbia, you're negative seats.
translation.zh: 哥伦比亚号 你们超过弹射高度了

translation.en: And liftoff.
translation.zh: （1983年 挑战者号） 发射

translation.en: Liftoff of the orbiter Challenger and the sixth flight of the Space Shuttle.
translation.zh: 轨道飞行器挑战者号发射 以及哥伦比亚号航天飞机第六次飞行

translation.en: [Kluger] What's been happening at NASA has been a very long term drift
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署 对于载人太空飞行计划

translation.en: in terms of the manned space program.
translation.zh: 长期以来飘忽不定

translation.en: After we went to the Moon,
translation.zh: 我们登上月球之后

translation.en: it was the carousel of shuttle flights around the Earth for 30-some years.
translation.zh: 接下来的30几年间 往返地球太空飞行盛况空前

translation.en: That was it.
translation.zh: 但仅止于此

translation.en: [mission control] We have ignition and liftoff
translation.zh: 我们发射了亚特兰提斯号 还有伽利略号太空船

translation.en: of Atlantis and the Galileo spacecraft bound for Jupiter.
translation.zh: 我们发射了亚特兰提斯号 还有伽利略号太空船 目的地是木星

translation.en: [CAPCOM] Roger roll, Atlantis.
translation.zh: 好的 亚特兰提斯号

translation.en: [Dr. Kaku] The Space Shuttle can't reach deep space.
translation.zh: 航天飞机无法到达更深入的宇宙太空

translation.en: The Space Shuttle was only designed to go whizzing around the planet Earth.
translation.zh: 当初设计哥伦比亚航天飞机 只是为了在地球附近围绕

translation.en: And so we began to realize that NASA lost its way.
translation.zh: 于是我们开始发现 美国航空航天总署已经失了方向

translation.en: And liftoff of Space Shuttle Discovery
translation.zh: 发现号航天飞机

translation.en: to complete NASA's constellation of tracking stations in the sky.
translation.zh: 是美国航空航天总署 空中追踪站的最后一颗星

translation.en: [Raj] I understand things are being done by NASA right now.
translation.zh: 我明白现在美国航空航天总署 很努力地想把事情做好

translation.en: But I feel like after the '60s,
translation.zh: 但我觉得自从20世纪60年代以后

translation.en: the acceleration of the program just declined to a sad point.
translation.zh: 太空计划进展的速度慢得可怜

translation.en: [mission control] And liftoff of the Space Shuttle Endeavour.
translation.zh: 发射奋进号航天飞机

translation.en: [CAPCOM] Roger roll, Endeavour.
translation.zh: 好了 奋进号

translation.en: [deGrasse Tyson] We are no longer advancing a space frontier.
translation.zh: 我们不再推进太空边境

translation.en: A space frontier is: how far have you gone lately?
translation.zh: 所谓太空边境 指的是最近几次计划触及到哪里？

translation.en: Where are our farthest astronauts?
translation.zh: 我们的宇航员最远到哪里？

translation.en: They're 250 miles above our head, driving around the block,
translation.zh: 他们在我们头上四百多公里的高处

translation.en: boldly going where hundreds have gone before.
translation.zh: 在外太空围绕着 勇敢地前往几百人曾经去过的地方

translation.en: That is not advancing space frontiers.
translation.zh: 这样不算推进太空边境

translation.en: [Urban] Low Earth orbit is about putting stuff in space to look back down on Earth.
translation.zh: 近地轨道是为了 在太空中放置监看地球的东西

translation.en: It's about support for Earth industries.
translation.zh: 这是为了支持地球的产业

translation.en: The Space Shuttle sounds like this big exciting thing.
translation.zh: 航天飞机听起来像是 令人兴奋的大计划

translation.en: The Space Shuttle! We're exploring!
translation.zh: 我们在太空探险！

translation.en: But actually what the Space Shuttle was was kind of a cargo delivery vehicle.
translation.zh: 但事实上所谓航天飞机 其实只是载运货物的工具

translation.en: It would bring astronauts and equipment, back and forth from low Earth orbit.
translation.zh: 它可以从近地轨道 载运宇航员和设备往返

translation.en: [Kluger] The Shuttle drained NASA's resources.
translation.zh: 航天飞机耗尽了 美国航空航天总署的资源

translation.en: It was a financial sinkhole, essentially, from 1975 up through 2011.
translation.zh: 从1975年到2011年 这段期间内财政陷入困境

translation.en: Any dreams of going to Mars during the Shuttle era were impossible
translation.zh: 在所谓的航天飞机时代 任何登上火星的梦想都不可能

translation.en: because all of the money was going to the Shuttle.
translation.zh: 因为所有的钱都拿来建造航天飞机了

translation.en: [Josh] NASA is kind of at a holdup. We haven't gone places.
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署似乎遭遇瓶颈 我们完全没有进展

translation.en: So don't go to space.
translation.zh: 那就别上太空了

translation.en: But what you can send to Mars are non-humans and non-living things,
translation.zh: 但还是可以 把非人类和非生物送上火星

translation.en: like robots.
translation.zh: 例如机器人

translation.en: [instructor] Before you leave this table, I need you to figure out what your robot's primary task is going to be.
translation.zh: 在你们离开之前 你们必须确认机器人的首要任务

translation.en: You can't just send all of them in there and have all four of them try and do the same task.
translation.zh: 不能让四台机器人全都做一样的事

translation.en: That's not going to be productive.
translation.zh: 这样毫无效率可言

translation.en: [Aurora] All right, guys, we got everything up here, so...
translation.zh: 好了 各位 所有东西都列在上面了

translation.en: Is that everything?
translation.zh: 全都列上去了吗？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Yes, it is. -Can we get a picture?
translation.zh: -对 没错 -我们可以拍下来吗？

translation.en: [Jace] We do robotics at Space Camp
translation.zh: 我们在太空营做机器人

translation.en: because robotics is a huge part of the space program.
translation.zh: 因为机器人学在太空计划中 是非常重要的一部分

translation.en: Exploration done today isn't done by humans.
translation.zh: 现今所执行过的太空探险 并不是由人类完成的

translation.en: It's done by robots.
translation.zh: 而是由机器人完成的

translation.en: [Kluger] NASA's unmanned exploration of the solar system
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署的 非载人太阳系探险

translation.en: is the great unappreciated crown jewel of the space agency.
translation.zh: 在署内就像是不受赏识的璞玉

translation.en: [newscaster] It began here at the Kennedy Space Center, Florida.
translation.zh: 我们再次来到 佛罗里达州的肯尼迪太空中心

translation.en: Viking 1 and Viking 2 were readied for their separate journeys to Mars.
translation.zh: 维京一号和维京二号 已经准备好分别启程前往火星

translation.en: [Patrick] A robot is important for forerunner exploration,
translation.zh: 机器人在先驱太空探险中很重要

translation.en: where we send a robot first.
translation.zh: 意思就是我们先把机器人送上太空

translation.en: It lets us know it's OK for us to go there.
translation.zh: 它能让我们知道人类是否能安全上去

translation.en: The planet Mars right now is entirely populated by robots,
translation.zh: 目前火星完全被机器人占据了

translation.en: which is an interesting thing to think about.
translation.zh: 这是一件很有趣的事

translation.en: [Bobak Ferdowsi] Curiosity's designed specifically to look at
translation.zh: 好奇号的设计特别用来

translation.en: past habitability and present habitability of Mars.
translation.zh: 探测火星上是否存在 或是曾经存在适合人类生存的迹象

translation.en: That's really taking the step of where we understood there was once water on Mars
translation.zh: 这其实是源自于 我们知道火星上曾经有水

translation.en: to whether that water could have supported life on Mars,
translation.zh: 因此进一步我们要探讨 火星上的水是否曾孕育生命

translation.en: or maybe even still support life on Mars.
translation.zh: 或现在火星上是否仍可以孕育生命

translation.en: [mission control] And liftoff of the Atlas 5 with Curiosity,
translation.zh: 擎天神五号和好奇号一起发射

translation.en: seeking clues to the planetary puzzle about life on Mars.
translation.zh: 探索火星生命 这一未解谜团的蛛丝马迹

translation.en: [Ferdowsi] The thing that makes Mars so incredible is that it's this sister planet of ours,
translation.zh: 火星最棒的地方在于 它是我们地球的姐妹星球

translation.en: and the possibility that life could have arisen there some time in the past,
translation.zh: 而且过去某个时间点 火星上或许曾有生命存在

translation.en: that maybe life is more prevalent than we thought in the past.
translation.zh: 而现在的生命 可能比我们过去认知的更为普遍

translation.en: [mission control] At 10.13 local time we'll initiate the descent stage thermal batteries,
translation.zh: 当地时间10点13分 我们会促发降落台的热电池

translation.en: and from that point on EDL ops will take over.
translation.zh: 从那时候就开始启动下降着陆系统

translation.en: [Ferdowsi] I'm a little partial to the Curiosity rover.
translation.zh: 我个人偏爱好奇号

translation.en: [mission control] We're down to 90 meters per second
translation.zh: 我们的速度降到每秒90米

translation.en: at an altitude of 6.5 kilometers and descending.
translation.zh: 高度是6.5公里 开始降落

translation.en: I worked on that mission for almost 10 years.
translation.zh: 我参与该项任务已经快十年了

translation.en: [mission control] UHF is good.
translation.zh: 特高频收讯没问题

translation.en: Touchdown confirmed. We're safe on Mars!
translation.zh: 确认登陆 我们安全抵达火星！

translation.en: [Ferdowsi] I think the longer you spend working on them, the more attached you are to them.
translation.zh: 你跟他们共事越久 就会跟他们的感情越好

translation.en: They become kind of like kids.
translation.zh: 他们有点像孩子

translation.en: We are going to need a button pusher.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个人负责按下按钮

translation.en: -I can do that. -Jace!
translation.zh: -我可以 -杰斯！

translation.en: Jace, just a heads up, that's priority numero uno!
translation.zh: 杰斯 我先提醒你 这是第一优先

translation.en: Jace is a good programmer. We can't afford not to--
translation.zh: 杰斯是很棒的程序设计师 我们不能接受…

translation.en: -Jace, are you programming right now? -Yes.
translation.zh: -杰斯 你在写程序吗？很好 -对

translation.en: [Jace] With these robots, you have to learn
translation.zh: 关于机器人这部分 你必须学习如何设计程序

translation.en: how to program them to work without a human being at the controls.
translation.zh: 让他们在没有人类操控的情况下运作

translation.en: Can Bucky hold one side of the yellow doors?
translation.zh: 巴奇可以挡住黄色门的其中一边吗？

translation.en: Which side do you want? I can program for both.
translation.zh: 你想要哪一边？两边我都可以写程序

translation.en: Jace is so good at programming. He just went right to it!
translation.zh: 杰斯真的很会设计程序 他完全投入其中！

translation.en: He's got a ton of patience when it comes to testing that robot.
translation.zh: 只要一讲到测试机器人 他就非常有耐心

translation.en: A lot of times in retrieval,
translation.zh: 很多时候 在检索程序时

translation.en: the things are in a very specific place every time.
translation.zh: 程序中的各个项目 每次都在一个特定的位置

translation.en: So we can make a rough program, go out, figure out what happened wrong...
translation.zh: 所以我们可以先概略地写出一个程序 然后跑跑看哪里有问题

translation.en: ...then just make it more and more and more and more precise
translation.zh: 接着只要将它设计得越来越精准

translation.en: so we can perfectly execute that when the mission comes.
translation.zh: 任务开始的时候 就可以完美地执行程序

translation.en: Activate COMS.
translation.zh: 启动寻优模型系统

translation.en: Right now I'm learning how to code in Python.
translation.zh: 我现在正在学 怎么用Python写程序编码

translation.en: I'm new to it. I'll admit, I can't make something really complicated.
translation.zh: 我承认 这对我来说是新的程序语言 我没办法做出复杂的东西

translation.en: I can make a game of Pong work! That's about it.
translation.zh: 我用它写乒乓球游戏程序 大概就这样而已

translation.en: But I'm learning.
translation.zh: 但我正在学习

translation.en: A little nervous. It should work. I programmed it for a long time.
translation.zh: 有点紧张 应该没问题 我写了很久的程序

translation.en: [Ferdowsi] With Curiosity, what was amazing
translation.zh: 因为有了好奇号 很棒的是

translation.en: was that the first drill hole we drilled we found evidence of past water on Mars
translation.zh: 我们在火星钻的第一个洞 就让我们发现火星上曾经有水

translation.en: and that that water was kind of relatively fresh
translation.zh: 而且水蛮新鲜的

translation.en: and could have supported certain types of life as we know them on Earth.
translation.zh: 并且可能孕育某种型态的生命体 如同地球上的生命一样

translation.en: The next questions are really of whether life could exist on Mars.
translation.zh: 下一个问题就是 火星上真的曾经有生命存在吗？

translation.en: Future missions can go and actually look for evidence of life.
translation.zh: 未来的探测任务 可以进一步找寻火星上生命的证据

translation.en: And maybe the best way to do that is with humans,
translation.zh: 或许最好的方式是 直接送人类上火星 这样他们就能采集样本回来

translation.en: where they can bring samples back, like the Apollo missions did.
translation.zh: 直接送人类上火星 这样他们就能采集样本回来

translation.en: [Kluger] When we put a robot on Mars and we give it a name called "Curiosity",
translation.zh: 我们在火星上放一台机器人 然后称它为“好奇号”

translation.en: and we have it send down automatic Tweets,
translation.zh: 而且我们让它自动发送啾啾的声响

translation.en: and we love it and we call it names like "plucky" and "tough".
translation.zh: 我们很喜欢 说那代表“勇气”和“坚强”

translation.en: [Raj] We're on the ground.
translation.zh: 在此同时我们在地表上

translation.en: Just don't move yet! We gotta wait for Jace.
translation.zh: 先别动！我们必须等杰斯

translation.en: [all] Five, four, three, two, one!
translation.zh: -五 四 三 二 一 -五 四 三 二 一

translation.en: [instructor] Begin!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [Kluger] We humanize robots because it's the next best thing.
translation.zh: 我们把机器人变得人性化 因为它们是人类最好的替代品

translation.en: But in the case of explorers on other planets,
translation.zh: 但对于到其他星球探险来说

translation.en: humanizing, anthropomorphizing our machines
translation.zh: 将机器人性化与人格化

translation.en: are because we don't have real people to get there.
translation.zh: 是因为我们没有把真正的人类送上去

translation.en: [Raj] All right, lost a wheel.
translation.zh: 好 掉了个轮子

translation.en: [Ferdowsi] Humans can do in a day
translation.zh: 人类一天就能做完的事

translation.en: what it takes a robot months or sometimes years to accomplish.
translation.zh: 机器人要花上好几个月 甚至好几年才能完成

translation.en: Curiosity's been on the surface for a little more than three years now,
translation.zh: 好奇号在火星表面已经超过三年

translation.en: and we guess that a human could do that within a week.
translation.zh: 它做的事人类一周内就能做完

translation.en: All the science that we've done so far in that three years,
translation.zh: 这三年内我们利用科学成就的事

translation.en: a human could walk around, chisel rocks, look at them, investigate them.
translation.zh: 人可以直接在火星表面上走 凿开岩石 仔细观察并检查

translation.en: Don't move that. Don't move that. Patrick, don't move it!
translation.zh: 别动那个 派翠克 不要动！

translation.en: Patrick, don't move it!
translation.zh: 派翠克 不要动它！

translation.en: I can get it.
translation.zh: 我拿得到

translation.en: Just kind of disappointed that our bot didn't function how we wanted it to.
translation.zh: 我只是有点失望 我们的机器人运作情形不如预期

translation.en: It was only able to complete two or three tasks,
translation.zh: 它只能完成两到三件事

translation.en: rather than the about six that we had planned for.
translation.zh: 但我们原本预期应该可以做六件事

translation.en: [deGrasse Tyson] I've yet to see a ticker tape parade for robots.
translation.zh: 我还没见过 为了欢迎机器人的盛大游行

translation.en: Or a high school named after a robot.
translation.zh: 也没有听过以机器人命名的高中

translation.en: So, there's the vicarious value that one of us experiences that
translation.zh: 所以如果我们其中一个人 能代替全人类上火星去体验一切

translation.en: and comes back to talk about it.
translation.zh: 而且回来还能谈论经验 这就是他的价值

translation.en: You can touch that person.
translation.zh: 一个可以触摸到的人

translation.en: And that person carried out the dreams of a civilization.
translation.zh: 那个人能实现文明世界的梦想

translation.en: -[camper] No! -[Raj] Yo, man. Just keep going!
translation.zh: -不！ -兄弟 继续走啊！

translation.en: -[camper] Ten seconds! -[instructor] Nine, eight, seven, six...
translation.zh: 八 七 六 五

translation.en: [all] ...five, four, three, two, one...
translation.zh: 八 七 六 五 -四 三 二 一 -四 三 二 一

translation.en: -Zero! -[instructor] Stop all your robots!
translation.zh: -零！ -停下你们的机器人！

translation.en: [Jace] Programming error.
translation.zh: 程序设计失误

translation.en: Bot didn't function properly as how it was intended to.
translation.zh: 我们的机器人 并不如原本预期的正常运作

translation.en: It didn't perform as it did during testing.
translation.zh: 它的表现跟测试阶段不同

translation.en: It was really kind of down to me, and I kind of failed at the last second.
translation.zh: 说实在 这算是我的错 而且我在最后一秒出错

translation.en: [Josh] The best thing about Mars and why everybody wants to go to Mars
translation.zh: 火星最棒的地方在于 上面已经有我们的探测车

translation.en: is because we have rovers there.
translation.zh: 所以大家都想去火星

translation.en: We have machines, examples,
translation.zh: 火星上有我们的机器、范例

translation.en: everything from it that says, "Hey come, come to Mars, come to Mars."
translation.zh: 那里所有的东西都在对我们说 “快来吧 来火星吧”

translation.en: [camper] Can this be one of our layers?
translation.zh: 这可以当作其中一层的材料吗？

translation.en: [instructor] Yeah! You can use that as one of your layers!
translation.zh: 可以！你可以把它当作其中一层！

translation.en: [Josh] OK, we're naming it Neil Applestrong.
translation.zh: 好 我们决定将它取名为阿苹斯特朗

translation.en: Applenaut training, so that's where we have an astronaut that's a green apple
translation.zh: 这是苹果宇航员训练 我们用青苹果模拟宇航员

translation.en: and we make a space suit for it.
translation.zh: 然后我们要替它做一件太空衣

translation.en: [Jace] A really good way to look at a space suit
translation.zh: 太空衣很重要的地方在于

translation.en: is it has to keep you alive with oxygen and pressure.
translation.zh: 它必须提供氧气和压力 让你在太空中得以存活

translation.en: So a one-minute test.
translation.zh: 我们测试一分钟

translation.en: When it comes out you're gonna blot it dry.
translation.zh: 东西拿出来之后 你们要赶紧把水吸干

translation.en: We'll walk over to the hot box.
translation.zh: 我们走到热箱那边去

translation.en: Go. Down, down, down.
translation.zh: 好 放下去

translation.en: When it comes to space, I know a lot.
translation.zh: 一讲到太空的事 我懂得可多了

translation.en: [instructor] Stop! Hold them up.
translation.zh: 停！把它们拿起来

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: This is unfortunate.
translation.zh: -这真是太惨了 -什么？

translation.en: -What? -[Jace] I think there's water inside.
translation.zh: -这真是太惨了 -什么？ 里头进水了…

translation.en: [Josh] People living in space for a year now, that's huge for me. I love it.
translation.zh: 现在已有人在太空生活超过一年 这对我来说是很大的突破 我喜欢

translation.en: And it's like, whoa! I want to live in space for five years now!
translation.zh: 我简直想在太空住上五年！

translation.en: [Abby] To apply to become an astronaut,
translation.zh: 申请成为一名宇航员

translation.en: all you have to do is go to the NASA website
translation.zh: 只需要上美国航空航天总署的网站

translation.en: and you'll find a PDF that you can download, fill out, send back in.
translation.zh: 找到一个报名表填好再回传就行了

translation.en: The basic requirements to be an astronaut
translation.zh: 其实身为宇航员的基本要求

translation.en: are not actually that difficult to achieve.
translation.zh: 并不会很难达到

translation.en: You need to have a four-year degree in a related field of STEM:
translation.zh: 必须有四年大学 攻读理工相关科系的学历

translation.en: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math.
translation.zh: 包括科学、技术、工程和数学

translation.en: You need to have things such as general good health,
translation.zh: 必须身体健康

translation.en: reasonably good eyesight, hearing, those types of things.
translation.zh: 视力及听力正常等等

translation.en: But it's when you look at the requirements that aren't stated
translation.zh: 但是其他未列出来的需求

translation.en: that things become more difficult.
translation.zh: 反而更困难

translation.en: [Dr. Bob Behnken] The original group of seven folks,
translation.zh: 原本的团队有七个人 他们来的时候全都有军事背景

translation.en: they were all military background when they came into the office.
translation.zh: 他们来的时候全都有军事背景

translation.en: But of course the mission of actually going on to Mars
translation.zh: 不过前往火星的任务

translation.en: really requires a wide range of experiences,
translation.zh: 当然需要他们有各方面广泛的经验

translation.en: and so that includes medical doctors, it includes scientists,
translation.zh: 所以成员包含医生、科学家

translation.en: pretty much everything under the sun.
translation.zh: 基本上各行各业都有

translation.en: I think I get smarter as I get older!
translation.zh: 我觉得我随着年龄增长越来越聪明

translation.en: My time here as an astronaut
translation.zh: 我当宇航员的时间

translation.en: and my ability to have gone to space two times
translation.zh: 以及上过太空两次的能力

translation.en: has helped taken some baby steps
translation.zh: 让我有了些许的进展

translation.en: to take that next generation of space explorers even further.
translation.zh: 能够进一步帮助下一代的太空探险员

translation.en: [Dr. Thomas] I'm way too old to go to Mars.
translation.zh: 我现在要去火星太老了

translation.en: 25, 30 years from now, I'm gonna be 85, 90 years-old.
translation.zh: 再过25到30年 我就85到90岁了

translation.en: No way is NASA sending me to Mars.
translation.zh: 美国航空航天总署不可能送我上火星

translation.en: [Dr. Kaku] The Mars Generation, is the generation of today.
translation.zh: 火星时代指的是现在的年轻世代

translation.en: It's in their DNA to become the astronauts, to explore the red planet.
translation.zh: 他们有成为宇航员 并到火星探险的潜质

translation.en: [Abby] Ever since I was a little kid, I've wanted to be an astronaut.
translation.zh: 我从小就想当一名宇航员

translation.en: Going to Mars is definitely something that would help NASA to draw public interest
translation.zh: “前往火星”计划能帮助 美国航空航天总署引起公众兴趣

translation.en: and to reignite that fire we have for space travel.
translation.zh: 重新点燃大众对太空旅行的热情

translation.en: [Ian] We were born at exactly the right time.
translation.zh: 我们生在对的时间

translation.en: We will be in our early 30s around the time we are predicted to set foot on Mars.
translation.zh: 我们预计在30岁出头的年纪 就能登上火星

translation.en: And Neil Armstrong was only 38 when he set foot on the Moon.
translation.zh: 阿姆斯特朗踏上月球的时候才38岁

translation.en: [Alyssa] The age you should really start focusing more
translation.zh: 对我而言 在某个年纪

translation.en: and becoming really serious about becoming an astronaut
translation.zh: 一个人应该更认真地看待 你想成为宇航员这件事

translation.en: is for me, would probably be now,
translation.zh: 我觉得就是现在

translation.en: so around 14.
translation.zh: 所以大概14岁左右

translation.en: Mainly because I'm starting to get
translation.zh: 主要的原因是因为

translation.en: those certifications that I'll need in the future,
translation.zh: 我已经开始为了未来做准备 考取各式证照

translation.en: such as SCUBA diving certification, pilot's license
translation.zh: 例如潜水证照、飞行员执照

translation.en: and sky diving certification.
translation.zh: 还有跳伞的证照

translation.en: [Rachel] When I got into space heavily, I was probably about 13.
translation.zh: 我大概13岁开始就非常热衷太空

translation.en: If I had the chance to go to Mars, I would absolutely take it.
translation.zh: 如果我有机会去火星 我一定会去

translation.en: Like, I wouldn't even think about it.
translation.zh: 我完全不需要考虑

translation.en: [Zoe] I love space. I want to be an astronaut one day.
translation.zh: 我喜欢太空 我想成为一名宇航员

translation.en: If I died on Mars, it would be sad, obviously.
translation.zh: 如果我死在火星上 这显然会很令人难过

translation.en: But at least I would have died achieving my lifelong dream!
translation.zh: 但至少我是为了追寻毕生梦想而死

translation.en: [Kluger] It takes a certain kind of person. Most of us aren't those people.
translation.zh: 火星计划需要的是某种特别的人 而我们大部分不属于那种人

translation.en: We are fortunate, we've always been fortunate as a species,
translation.zh: 我们很幸运 身为人类 我们一直都很幸运

translation.en: that there are people like that.
translation.zh: 因为我们之中就有那样的人

translation.en: [Dr. Kaku] We have to be honest with the young generation of astronauts.
translation.zh: 我们必须对新一代的宇航员诚实

translation.en: And that is, yes, there are dangers,
translation.zh: 那就是告诉他们 没错 这会有危险

translation.en: dangers that can be quantified,
translation.zh: 无法量化的危险

translation.en: but nonetheless dangers that will involve perhaps injury, perhaps even death.
translation.zh: 但这样的危险可能包括受伤和死亡

translation.en: [instructor] All pilots learn how to escape from a crashed helicopter.
translation.zh: 所有的飞行员都必须学习 如何从坠落的直升机中逃生

translation.en: Because if you crash, what's gonna come save you?
translation.zh: 因为如果你坠机了 谁能救你？

translation.en: A helicopter.
translation.zh: 直升机

translation.en: What rescued the Apollo and, before, astronauts out of the ocean?
translation.zh: 阿波罗号失事时 谁在宇航员坠海前救了他们？

translation.en: -[camper] A helicopter. -[instructor] A helicopter.
translation.zh: -直升机 -直升机

translation.en: When you go in, you'll receive a number, like you were told before:
translation.zh: 你们进去之前 每个人都会有一个号码

translation.en: one, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四、五、六

translation.en: You will exit in the reverse order: six, five, four, three, two, one.
translation.zh: 你们出来的顺序是相反的 六、五、四、三、二、一

translation.en: There's only one place that you will exit.
translation.zh: 逃生的出口只有一个

translation.en: [Jace] We do water survival so that we can learn what to do
translation.zh: 我们练习水上逃生 以备未来真的发生意外的时候

translation.en: if something goes horribly wrong.
translation.zh: 我们知道该怎么做

translation.en: [instructor] We're going down!
translation.zh: 我们要坠机了！

translation.en: [Jace] If something happens and the hatch blows off of our spacecraft, it starts flooding,
translation.zh: 万一发生状况 太空船的舱门开了 然后开始淹水

translation.en: you have to learn how to get out and get out fast.
translation.zh: 你必须学习如何快速逃生

translation.en: Thank you, Instructor!
translation.zh: 谢谢你 老师！

translation.en: [Josh] If you're in a dangerous situation
translation.zh: 如果你身处危险环境

translation.en: where you're inside of a metal cage and it starts filling up with water,
translation.zh: 当你在金属制的密闭空间中 然后开始淹水

translation.en: you better know how to swim and you better know how to get out.
translation.zh: 你最好要会游泳 然后知道怎么逃出来

translation.en: Because you're gonna die. Metal doesn't float.
translation.zh: 否则你会死 因为金属不会漂浮

translation.en: -[instructor] Everybody out! -[Josh] Six out! Five, go!
translation.zh: -所有人都出去！ -六号出去！五号 快！

translation.en: You have to rely on your team to swim out before it goes all the way under.
translation.zh: 你必须仰赖你的队友 大家才能一起在机身淹没之前游出去

translation.en: And it's all about getting people to work together.
translation.zh: 这个练习的重点是 让我们学会团队合作

translation.en: Because nobody can go to space alone on their own.
translation.zh: 因为没有任何人能独自一人上太空

translation.en: Nobody has so far, and I don't believe anybody will.
translation.zh: 到目前为止没有过 而且我也不相信有谁能做到

translation.en: -You all ready for this? -[Raj] Yeah, I'm pumped.
translation.zh: -你们都准备好了吗？ -好了 我超兴奋的

translation.en: I would definitely be willing to die to go to Mars.
translation.zh: 我非常乐意为了上火星而死

translation.en: My life is worth all the things that the human race as a whole gain from that.
translation.zh: 想到全人类可能因此获得的资讯 我这一生就值得了

translation.en: [Senator Bill Nelson] When we went to the Moon,
translation.zh: 我们尝试登陆月球时

translation.en: we lost three astronauts before we ever got off the ground
translation.zh: 阿波罗一号在还没发射之前 就在发射台上起火燃烧

translation.en: in the Apollo 1 fire on the pad.
translation.zh: 我们失去了三名宇航员

translation.en: [newscaster] It was all over in one stunned, horrifying second.
translation.zh: 当时所有人都很震惊 非常可怕

translation.en: An electrical spark apparently shot out
translation.zh: 很显然有电线走火产生火花

translation.en: and ignited the 100% oxygen in the cabin that they were breathing,
translation.zh: 并引燃了机舱内人员 在真正太空航行中所呼吸的

translation.en: as in a real spaceflight.
translation.zh: 百分之百纯氧

translation.en: The crewmen never had a chance.
translation.zh: 机组人员完全来不及逃生

translation.en: [Senator Nelson] Now we come into the Space Shuttle,
translation.zh: 后来我们进入航天飞机的时代 我们应该已经很熟练了

translation.en: and it's supposed to be routine.
translation.zh: 后来我们进入航天飞机的时代 我们应该已经很熟练了 （1986年1月28日 挑战者号）

translation.en: And it's supposed to be this low incident.
translation.zh: 而且发生意外的机率应该很小

translation.en: Well, it almost happened to us on the 24th flight.
translation.zh: 不过意外差点在第24次飞行时发生

translation.en: Four scrubs, any one of which, had we launched,
translation.zh: 我们取消了四次发射 如果这当中有任何一次坚持发射

translation.en: it would have not been a good day.
translation.zh: 恐怕就没好下场了

translation.en: But then it happened to the 25th flight.
translation.zh: 不过第25次发行时依然发生了意外

translation.en: [mission control] Three, two, one, and liftoff.
translation.zh: 三 二 一 发射

translation.en: Liftoff of the 25th Space Shuttle mission and it has cleared the tower.
translation.zh: 第25次航天飞机任务发射 航天飞机驶离发射塔

translation.en: [newscaster] So the 25th Space Shuttle mission is now on the way,
translation.zh: 经过美国航空航天总署多次延迟之后

translation.en: after more delays than NASA cares to count.
translation.zh: 第25次的航天飞机任务终于启航

translation.en: This morning it looked as though they were not going to be able to get off.
translation.zh: 这天早上 它看起来不像可以成功发射

translation.en: [mission control] 1 minute 15 seconds, velocity 2,900 feet per second.
translation.zh: 1分15秒过后 每秒将近900米的速度

translation.en: Altitude 9 nautical miles, downrange just at 7 nautical miles.
translation.zh: 高度从将近二万米降到一万多米

translation.en: [Ronald Reagan] I want to say something to the school children of America
translation.zh: 我想跟正在收看现场直播 航天飞机发射画面的

translation.en: who were watching the live coverage of the Shuttle's takeoff.
translation.zh: 美国学校孩童们说几句话

translation.en: I know it's hard to understand,
translation.zh: 我知道这很难理解

translation.en: but sometimes painful things like this happen.
translation.zh: 但有时候就是会发生这样惨痛的事情

translation.en: It's all part of the process of exploration and discovery.
translation.zh: 这都是太空探险和探索未知的过程

translation.en: It's all part of taking a chance and expanding man's horizons.
translation.zh: 这都是因为人类想要开拓视野

translation.en: The future doesn't belong to the fainthearted.
translation.zh: 懦弱的人无法迎接未来

translation.en: It belongs to the brave.
translation.zh: 只有勇敢的人才能创造未来

translation.en: [newscaster] What we're seeing here is very ominous indeed.
translation.zh: 你们所看到的画面确实很吓人

translation.en: These are pictures which tell the story that is clearly the Shuttle breaking up.
translation.zh: 这些是事发的照片 我们可以看到航天飞机在空中解体

translation.en: [Kluger] Somebody once asked me,
translation.zh: 曾经有人问过我

translation.en: "Is it possible to write an article on three ways to make the Shuttle safer?"
translation.zh: “你能不能写一篇文章提供 能让航天飞机更安全的三种方式？”

translation.en: And my answer is "Yes, I can write it right now.
translation.zh: 我回他说：“可以 我现在马上就能写出来

translation.en: Don't fly Discovery, don't fly Atlantis, don't fly Endeavour.
translation.zh: 别发射发现者号和亚特兰提斯号 也别发射奋进号

translation.en: Problem solved."
translation.zh: 问题就解决了”

translation.en: But we flew.
translation.zh: 但我们还是发射了

translation.en: We lost no more people
translation.zh: 后续我们没有再造成人员丧命

translation.en: and the program ended in something close to triumph.
translation.zh: 计划几乎是以成功胜利的姿态结束

translation.en: But 14 people died.
translation.zh: 但共有14人因此丧生

translation.en: [mission control] All three engines up and working.
translation.zh: 三个引擎全都正常运作

translation.en: Two, one, zero. And liftoff!
translation.zh: 二 一 零 发射！

translation.en: The final liftoff of Atlantis.
translation.zh: 亚特兰提斯航天飞机最后一次发射

translation.en: On the shoulders of the Space Shuttle. America will continue the dream.
translation.zh: 亚特兰提斯航天飞机最后一次发射 美国人将会持续做着太空梦

translation.en: [Dr. Behnken] I really feel that it's a part of each of our legacies
translation.zh: 我真的觉得 我们留下来的人 必须延续当初那些丧命的宇航员

translation.en: to carry on that piece that those astronauts that we lost started.
translation.zh: 我真的觉得 我们留下来的人 必须延续当初那些丧命的宇航员 未完成的事 这是我们的责任

translation.en: Their legacy is that we can continue the journey.
translation.zh: 他们的遗愿就是我们继续太空旅程
